synopsis.text: Detective Shunsaku Ban and his young assistant, Kenichi, embark on a mission to the sprawling metropolis of the future, where humans and robots coexist in a delicate balance. Their target: Dr. Laughton, a rogue scientist suspected of illegal organ trafficking. Amidst the chaos of anti-robot factions and escalating unrest, Kenichi stumbles upon Tima, an enigmatic girl with no recollection of her past. As they flee from the relentless pursuit of Duke Red and his adopted son, Rock, Kenichi discovers that Tima is more than she seems - a cutting-edge android designed to seize control of Metropolis. Meanwhile, Shunsaku delves deeper into the city's dark secrets, uncovering a web of conspiracy and power struggles that threaten to upend the fragile peace between humans and robots. As the true identity of Tima and the ambitions of Duke Red come to light, Kenichi and Shunsaku must navigate a dangerous world of intrigue and deception to protect Tima and unravel the mysteries of Metropolis.
